content: Moving several files to the Form Filling room is not supported. Move one {{ organizationName }} PDF form at a time.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a warning message when moving multiple files to a specific room. The message informs users that this action is not supported and suggests moving one PDF form at a time instead. This message appears in the FilesSelector component when the user attempts to move several files.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Moving several files' is translated as 'لا يُسمح بنقل أكثر من ملف واحد'. While technically correct, it's a bit passive. A more direct translation, reflecting the prohibition, would be better. The original emphasizes the action being unsupported.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: يُمنع نقل أكثر من ملف واحد

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of '{{ organizationName }}' should be consistent with the application’s implementation. Verify it’s correctly handled during rendering.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No change needed, verify application rendering

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Moving several files' is translated as 'Birdən çox faylın...köçürülməsi'. While technically correct, a more natural translation would be 'Bir neçə faylın...köçürülməsi' or 'Çox sayda faylın...köçürülməsi'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bir neçə faylın Forma Doldurma otağına köçürülməsi dəstəklənmir.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Czech translation uses a lowercase 'p' in 'přesunujte'. It should be capitalized to match the first instance 'Přesunutí' which is a noun and should align with the subject of the sentence. The imperative form should be capitalized.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Přesunujte

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses 'à la fois' which is grammatically correct but sounds slightly less natural in this context than 'un par un'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Déplacez un formulaire PDF {{ organizationName }} un par un.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon after 'սենյակ' in the Armenian translation seems misplaced. It disrupts the flow of the sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the colon after 'սենյակ'. The sentence should read: 'Մի քանի ֆայլ տեղափոխելը Ձևաթղթերի լրացման սենյակ չի աջակցվում: Միանգամից տեղափոխեք մեկ {{ organizationName }} PDF ձև' or restructure the sentence.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Մի քանի ֆայլ տեղափոխելը" could be more accurately translated to reflect the negative connotation. It's a bit literal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like: 'Մի քանի ֆայլերի տեղափոխումը' or 'Բազմաֆայլ տեղափոխումը'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "stanza di compilazione dei moduli" is a literal translation of "Form Filling room" and sounds unnatural in Italian. A more natural phrasing would be "area di compilazione moduli" or "stanza per la compilazione dei moduli".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider replacing "stanza di compilazione dei moduli" with "area di compilazione moduli" or "stanza per la compilazione dei moduli".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ລູກ' (luk) is used with 'ໄຟລ໌' (files). While 'ລູກ' means 'child' or 'piece', it's not the appropriate term to describe files. It implies individual pieces of the file.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'ເອກະບຸคคล' (ek-ka-buk-kon) which means 'individual' or removing it entirely as the context is already clear.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The variable {{ organizationName }} is correctly placed but the Lao translation reads a little awkwardly because of its placement. A slight rephrasing could improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການເຄື່ອນແບບຟອມ PDF ຂອງ {{ organizationName }} ຫນຶ່ງຢ່າງຄັ້ງລະຫນຶ່ງ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Polish translation retains the English phrasing 'Pokoju do wypełniania formularzy' which is a bit clunky. A more natural phrasing would be 'Pokoju wypełniania formularzy' or 'Pokoju formularzy'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Przenoszenie kilku plików do Pokoju wypełniania formularzy nie jest obsługiwane. Przenoś po jednym formularzu PDF {{ organizationName }} na raz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not incorrect, using 'Przenieś' instead of 'Przenoś' would make the sentence flow more naturally and is more common in instructions.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Przenoszenie kilku plików do Pokoju do wypełniania formularzy nie jest obsługiwane. Przenieś po jednym formularzu PDF {{ organizationName }} na raz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'formularío PDF' is redundant and doesn't accurately convey the English 'PDF form'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Não há suporte para a movimentação de vários arquivos para a sala de preenchimento de formulários. Mova um formulário PDF {{ organizationName }} de cada vez.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repetition of 'PDF' creates an awkward phrasing. A better flow is needed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Não há suporte para a movimentação de vários arquivos para a sala de preenchimento de formulários. Mova um formulário PDF {{ organizationName }} de cada vez.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation uses 'Deplasați câte un formular PDF {{ organizationName }}.' which could be improved for readability. It's a little abrupt. It should be more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Deplasați câte un PDF {{ organizationName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ආකෘතියක්' (aakrutiyak) is a bit awkward. While technically correct, it can be improved for natural flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ආකෘතියක් වෙනුවට 'පෝරමයක්' භාවිතා කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing 'එකවරක් යවන්න' (ekavarak yavanna) is grammatically correct but sounds slightly formal and unnatural in this context. It's a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: එකවරක් යවන්න වෙනුවට 'එකවරම යවන්න' භාවිතා කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'Premiestňujte' (imperative form) is slightly awkward. It's better to use a more neutral phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Presúvajte jeden {{ organizationName }} PDF formulár naraz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Consistency in the word 'formulár' (singular) is slightly off. The English uses 'form' but the Slovak uses 'formulár'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Presúvajte jeden {{ organizationName }} PDF formulár naraz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'PDF' is repeated unnecessarily. It's not needed after 'obrazec'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Premikanje več datotek v prostor za izpolnjevanje obrazcev ni podprto. Premaknite po en obrazec {{ organizationName }} naenkrat.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'преместите' is used twice. While technically correct, using a more consistent verb form would improve readability. 'Премештајте' is more standard for addressing someone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Премештајте

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'fajlova' is a less common and somewhat archaic form. 'Datoteka' or 'fajl' are more modern and preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Premještanje više datoteka u sobu za popunjavanje obrazaca nije podržano. Premestite jedan {{ organizationName }} PDF obrazac u isto vreme.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Ukrainian translation uses a hyphenated 'PDF-форму'. While technically correct, a more common and natural phrasing would be 'PDF форму'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: PDF форму

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "several files" as "một số tập tin" is accurate, but the overall phrasing is a bit awkward. A more natural Vietnamese phrasing for the entire first part of the sentence would improve readability. The current translation sounds somewhat literal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing the first part of the sentence to something like "Không hỗ trợ việc di chuyển nhiều tập tin..." or "Không được phép di chuyển nhiều tập tin..."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The placement of the variable '{{ organizationName }}' feels slightly unnatural in the Vietnamese translation. While technically correct, it disrupts the flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider restructuring the sentence to integrate '{{ organizationName }}' more smoothly, perhaps by saying: '...từng biểu mẫu PDF của {{ organizationName }} mỗi lần.' or '...từng biểu mẫu PDF {{ organizationName }} một lần.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase '表单填写房间' (Form Filling Room) is a literal translation and might not be the most natural or idiomatic way to refer to the room in Chinese. A more common and clearer term might be used depending on the specific context of the application.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like '表单处理房间' (Form Processing Room), '表单上传房间' (Form Upload Room), or a room name specific to the application if available.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The variable {{ organizationName }} is correctly placed in the Chinese translation, maintaining the same functionality as in the English source.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No change needed.
